scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run version:sync && npm run changelog:generate
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run version:sync && npm run changelog:generate
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run version:sync && npm run changelog:generate
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements/development.txt

scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
